entity.name: Phil Murphy
entity.description: US Governor of New Jersey Phil Murphy

entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
The President and I also discussed the need for direct cash assistance for states ravaged by #COVID19.
 
We need the federal government as a partner in our restart and recovery, just as they have been in our mitigation.
 
I look forward to our continued partnership.
